fields.description: A shared database server is offline affecting a small percentage of applications. We are working to recover the database server and will provide updates as we have more information.
fields.title: Website Down
fields.resolution: Per the previous update, we are no longer tracking this issue.

fields.description: We are investigating elevated error rates on the platform.
fields.title: Elevated Error Rates
fields.resolution: Performance and error rates are back to normal.
